title: Shirobara-sama no Iutoori.
original_name: 白薔薇サマの言うとおり。
sinopse:
Super commoner Ayame just entered Shirobara Academy, an elite school. Suddenly, she's pushed around by the super sadistic student council president...!?

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Kare wa Okurete Yattekuru
